query.statement:
SELECT
S001
,ZCD1.CTEXT2 AS S003 ,ZCD2.CTEXT2 AS S004 ,ZCD3.CTEXT2 AS S005 ,ZCD4.CTEXT2 AS S006 ,ZCD5.CTEXT2 AS S007 ,ZCD6.CTEXT2 AS S008 ,ZCD7.CTEXT2 AS S009 ,ZCD8.CTEXT2 AS S011 ,ZCD9.CTEXT2 AS S012 ,ZCD10.CTEXT2 AS S013 ,ZCD11.CTEXT2 AS S014 ,ZCD12.CTEXT2 AS S015 ,ZCD13.CTEXT2 AS S016 ,S023
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST703 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD1 ON ZCD1.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZCD1.LANG = 'ko' AND ZCD1.CODE1 = 'CSS003' AND ZCD1.CODE2 = A.S003
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD2 ON ZCD2.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZCD2.LANG = 'ko' AND ZCD2.CODE1 = 'CSS004' AND ZCD2.CODE2 = A.S004
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD3 ON ZCD3.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZCD3.LANG = 'ko' AND ZCD3.CODE1 = 'CSS005' AND ZCD3.CODE2 = A.S005
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD4 ON ZCD4.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZCD4.LANG = 'ko' AND ZCD4.CODE1 = 'CSS006' AND ZCD4.CODE2 = A.S006
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD5 ON ZCD5.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZCD5.LANG = 'ko' AND ZCD5.CODE1 = 'CSS007' AND ZCD5.CODE2 = A.S007
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD6 ON ZCD6.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZCD6.LANG = 'ko' AND ZCD6.CODE1 = 'CSS008' AND ZCD6.CODE2 = A.S008
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD7 ON ZCD7.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZCD7.LANG = 'ko' AND ZCD7.CODE1 = 'CSS009' AND ZCD7.CODE2 = A.S009
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD8 ON ZCD8.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZCD8.LANG = 'ko' AND ZCD8.CODE1 = 'CSS011' AND ZCD8.CODE2 = A.S011
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD9 ON ZCD9.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZCD9.LANG = 'ko' AND ZCD9.CODE1 = 'CSS012' AND ZCD9.CODE2 = A.S012
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD10 ON ZCD10.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZCD10.LANG = 'ko' AND ZCD10.CODE1 = 'CSS013' AND ZCD10.CODE2 = A.S013
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD11 ON ZCD11.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZCD11.LANG = 'ko' AND ZCD11.CODE1 = 'CSS014' AND ZCD11.CODE2 = A.S014
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD12 ON ZCD12.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZCD12.LANG = 'ko' AND ZCD12.CODE1 = 'CSS015' AND ZCD12.CODE2 = A.S015
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZCD13 ON ZCD13.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZCD13.LANG = 'ko' AND ZCD13.CODE1 = 'CSS016' AND ZCD13.CODE2 = A.S016
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
